/* See also */ List of Christian denominations

/* Eastern Orthodox churches in communion */ links

/* Eastern Orthodox churches in communion */ links on sites
[[WP:AES|â]]Replaced content with 'SCOBA has decided to remove this Page! thank you WIKI !'
/* External links */ Prerogatives of the Ecumenical Patriarchate
I respectfully disagree, the UOC-MP is autonomous and recognized by other Orthodox Churches. It may not be autocephalous but it is a national church that rules itself save for the election of bishops
I think the Ukrainian Church, as a separate entity, is not in communion with the others and so there isn't freedom to associate
/* Eastern Orthodox churches in communion */ link towards orthodox ohrid archbishopric
it's->its ("it's" means "it is" or "it has", never "belonging to it" ) using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Clarified that the OCA is regarded by some Orthodox as not being autocephalous and not being autonomous... It is still a canonical church in communion with other churches...
Added quotation by Alexander Schmemann regarding the Liturgy... Also added quote from the Christianization of Kievan Rus'...
Added details about Orthodox recognition of scripture. Clarifying that we do believe it's inspired (though not dictated) by the Holy Spirit. Also added veneration to the sentence about icons.
Changed "Jesus Christs" within Jesus Christ to "Little Christs" within Jesus Christ... This should be more in line with the Orthodox doctrine of theosis.
removed the word "little" from the phrase "become like little Jesus Christs within Jesus Christ"
[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 293356072 by [[Special:Contributions/88.161.66.150|88.161.66.150]] ([[User talk:88.161.66.150|talk]]) "Doxa" does in fact mean "belief", not "opinion".
/* Nomenclature */ corrected factual error: "doxa" does not mean "glory" in greek, but "opinion", this is why orthodox translates as "of the truthful faith".removed reference because info changed
/* Marriage */ while the metropolitan did say that people have a right to ask for it, the cited reference falsely suggests that he supported it. Also, it is an isolated case and not representative.
Repairing link to disambiguation page - [[Wikipedia:Disambiguation pages with links|You can help!]]
Robot-assisted fix [[WP:DPL|links to disambiguation page]] Roman
